verses.verse: בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֡וּא <WH1931> he יִפְקֹ֣ד <WH6485> shall punish יְהוָה֩ <WH3068> the LORD בְּחַרְב֨וֹ <WH2719> sword הַקָּשָׁ֜ה <WH7186> with his sore וְהַגְּדוֹלָ֣ה <WH1419> and great וְהַֽחֲזָקָ֗ה <WH2389> and strong עַ֤ל <WH5921> Even לִוְיָתָן֙ <WH3882> leviathan נָחָ֣שׁ <WH5175> serpent בָּרִ֔חַ <WH1281> the piercing וְעַל֙ <WH5921> Even לִוְיָתָ֔ן <WH3882> even leviathan נָחָ֖שׁ <WH5175> serpent עֲקַלָּת֑וֹן <WH6129> that crooked וְהָרַ֥ג <WH2026> and he shall slay אֶת־ <WH853> הַתַּנִּ֖ין <WH8577> the dragon אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who בַּיָּֽם׃ <WH3220> that [is] in the sea ס
בַּיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> he כֶּ֥רֶם <WH3754> ye unto her A vineyard חֶ֖מֶד <WH2531> desirable עַנּוּ־ <WH6030> testify לָֽהּ׃

אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> I the LORD נֹֽצְרָ֔הּ <WH5341> do keep לִרְגָעִ֖ים <WH7281> it every moment אַשְׁקֶ֑נָּה <WH8248> it I will water פֶּ֚ן <WH6435> one יִפְקֹ֣ד <WH6485> lest [any] hurt עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> and לַ֥יְלָה <WH3915> it night וָי֖וֹם <WH3117> and day אֶצֳּרֶֽנָּה׃ <WH5341> it I will keep

חֵמָ֖ה <WH2534> Fury אֵ֣ין <WH369> have לִ֑י מִֽי־ <WH4310> someone יִתְּנֵ֜נִי <WH5414> [is] not in me who would set שָׁמִ֥יר <WH8068> the briers שַׁ֙יִת֙ <WH7898> [and] thorns בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> battle אֶפְשְׂעָ֥ה <WH6585> step בָ֖הּ אֲצִיתֶ֥נָּה <WH6702> through them I would burn יָּֽחַד׃ <WH3162> them together

א֚וֹ <WH176> Or יַחֲזֵ֣ק <WH2388> Or let him take hold בְּמָעוּזִּ֔י <WH4581> of my strength יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> [that] he may make שָׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> peace לִ֑י שָׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> peace יַֽעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> with me [and] he shall make לִּֽי׃

הַבָּאִים֙ <WH935> He shall cause them that come יַשְׁרֵ֣שׁ <WH8327> to take root יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> of Jacob יָצִ֥יץ <WH6692> shall blossom וּפָרַ֖ח <WH6524> and bud יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel וּמָלְא֥וּ <WH4390> and fill פְנֵי־ <WH6440> the face תֵבֵ֖ל <WH8398> of the world תְּנוּבָֽה׃ <WH8570> with fruit ס

הַכְּמַכַּ֥ת <WH4347> him as he smote מַכֵּ֖הוּ <WH5221> Hath he smitten הִכָּ֑הוּ <WH5221> those that smote אִם־ <WH518> Or כְּהֶ֥רֶג <WH2027> according to the slaughter הֲרֻגָ֖יו <WH2026> him? [or] is he slain הֹרָֽג׃ <WH2026> of them that are slain

בְּסַאסְּאָ֖ה <WH5432> In measure בְּשַׁלְחָ֣הּ <WH7971> when it shooteth forth תְּרִיבֶ֑נָּה <WH7378> thou wilt debate הָגָ֛ה <WH1898> with it he stayeth בְּרוּח֥וֹ <WH7307> wind הַקָּשָׁ֖ה <WH7186> his rough בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> in the day קָדִֽים׃ <WH6921> of the east wind

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore בְּזֹאת֙ <WH2063> By this יְכֻפַּ֣ר <WH3722> be purged עֲוֹֽן־ <WH5771> therefore shall the iniquity יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> of Jacob וְזֶ֕ה <WH2088> and this כָּל־ <WH3605> will be the full פְּרִ֖י <WH6529> and this [is] all the fruit הָסִ֣ר <WH5493> to take away חַטָּאת֑וֹ <WH2403> his sin בְּשׂוּמ֣וֹ ׀ <WH7760> when he maketh כָּל־ <WH3605> all אַבְנֵ֣י <WH68> all the stones מִזְבֵּ֗חַ <WH4196> of the altar כְּאַבְנֵי־ <WH68> stones גִר֙ <WH1615> as chalkstones מְנֻפָּצ֔וֹת <WH5310> that are beaten in sunder לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not יָקֻ֥מוּ <WH6965> shall not stand up אֲשֵׁרִ֖ים <WH842> the groves וְחַמָּנִֽים׃ <WH2553> and images

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for עִ֤יר <WH5892> city בְּצוּרָה֙ <WH1219> Yet the defenced בָּדָ֔ד <WH910> [shall be] desolate נָוֶ֕ה <WH5116> [and] the habitation מְשֻׁלָּ֥ח <WH7971> forsaken וְנֶעֱזָ֖ב <WH5800> and left כַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> like a wilderness שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> There יִרְעֶ֥ה <WH7462> feed עֵ֛גֶל <WH5695> there shall the calf וְשָׁ֥ם <WH8033> and there יִרְבָּ֖ץ <WH7257> and there shall he lie down וְכִלָּ֥ה <WH3615> and consume סְעִפֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5585> the branches

בִּיבֹ֤שׁ <WH3001> thereof are withered קְצִירָהּ֙ <WH7105> When the boughs תִּשָּׁבַ֔רְנָה <WH7665> they shall be broken off נָשִׁ֕ים <WH802> the women בָּא֖וֹת <WH935> come מְאִיר֣וֹת <WH215> [and] set them on fire אוֹתָ֑הּ <WH853> כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> are not עַם־ <WH5971> for it [is] a people בִּינוֹת֙ <WH998> of no understanding ה֔וּא <WH1931> he עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּן֙ <WH3651> after that לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not יְרַחֲמֶ֣נּוּ <WH7355> them will not have mercy עֹשֵׂ֔הוּ <WH6213> therefore he that made וְיֹצְר֖וֹ <WH3335> on them and he that formed לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יְחֻנֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH2603> them will shew them no favour ס

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he יַחְבֹּ֧ט <WH2251> shall beat off יְהוָ֛ה <WH3069> God מִשִּׁבֹּ֥לֶת <WH7641> from the channel הַנָּהָ֖ר <WH5104> of the river עַד־ <WH5704> against נַ֣חַל <WH5158> unto the stream מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְאַתֶּ֧ם <WH859> and you תְּלֻקְּט֛וּ <WH3950> and ye shall be gathered לְאַחַ֥ד <WH259> one אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> by one בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> O ye children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel ס

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <WH1961> will come בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he יִתָּקַע֮ <WH8628> shall be blown בְּשׁוֹפָ֣ר <WH7782> trumpet גָּדוֹל֒ <WH1419> [that] the great וּבָ֗אוּ <WH935> and they shall come הָאֹֽבְדִים֙ <WH6> which were ready to perish בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land אַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> of Assyria וְהַנִּדָּחִ֖ים <WH5080> and the outcasts בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְהִשְׁתַּחֲו֧וּ <WH7812> and shall worship לַיהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּהַ֥ר <WH2022> mount הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> in the holy בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> at Jerusalem
